params._allocations: Array of recipient allocations (in basis points)

returns._0: uint256 Voting weight in basis points (e.g., 1000 = 10%)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rescueToken(address).details: Cannot be used to rescue the stablecoin used for streaming

params.token: Address of the token to rescue

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

vote().details: Automatically triggers cancellation if threshold is reached

donate(uint256).notice: Allows users to donate stablecoins to the fund

getVotingWeight(address).notice: Calculates a donor's voting weight in basis points

rescueToken(address).notice: Allows owner to rescue accidentally sent tokens

startStreaming().notice: Initiates streaming of funds to recipients

vote().notice: Allows donors to vote for cancelling streams
